main event: Multiple reports concerning unidentified flying objects in Ohio during the 1960s.
interesting points: Witnesses described a glowing sphere which emitted a buzzing sound., Report from April 7, 1960 noted sightings of an object at 300 - 500 ft., Conflicting information regarding the reported sightings necessitated clarification request., Witnesses from Carlisle, Ohio were unable to identify the object they saw., Historical context relates to Project Blue Book's investigation of UFO reports.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects or glowing sphere
witness description: Subjects interviewed reported seeing unusual objects
